price: លើកលែងតែអ៊ីព្លីសប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលបានក្រអឺតក្រទម។ ហើយវាបានស្ថិតក្នុងចំណោមពួកដែលប្រឆាំង។
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
